Text:
thanks EZ for the past uploads but mp4 sucks or guess i'm the only one that they don't play good for.
sorry i don't see the advantage to mp4

The mp4 is fine. It is better on my screen than the old non-hd uploads. Much less distorted pixels on my 50", plus it plays on my mobile devices. Can't believe you're actually complaining.... Thank you eztv.
Have you tried VLC Player? They play great for me on this!
